entry.data:
SNOW WITH FREEZING DRIZZLE LIKELY THIS EVENING, THEN SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 3 INCHES
ICE ACCUMULATION AROUND A TRACE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 19
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS 15 TO 20

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
